# Moli

> Moli is a foundation model-powered AI copilot for safety assessment of raw biomaterials, helping researchers and safety assessors evaluate chemical safety through molecular intelligence. Data retrieval, analysis and reporting in one integrated system.

## Product
- AI-powered safety assessment: Assess chemical safety of raw biomaterials using foundation models trained on molecular data
- Comprehensive analysis: Retrieve relevant data, analyze molecular properties, and generate safety reports
- Integrated workflow: Streamline safety assessment workflows without switching between multiple tools

## Foundation Models
- Foundation model for safety workflows: Advanced AI models trained specifically for predictive toxicology

## Recognition
Moli has been nominated for the Lush Young Researcher Prize 2026, recognizing innovation in non-animal methods for chemical safety assessment.

## Resources
- <a href="https://lushprize.org/2026-prize/2026-prize-shortlist/">Lush Prize 2026 Shortlist</a>: Fouder's nomination for Young Researcher Prize
